News.Title: Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds Reports Mixed Q2 Results with Profit Growth Despite Revenue Decline
News.Summary: Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds reported quarterly net profit of 22.4 million rupees compared to 20.7 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue declined to 268.5 million rupees from 282.1 million rupees year-over-year. EBITDA increased to 41.5 million rupees from 30.8 million rupees, while EBITDA margin improved to 15.45% from 10.93% in the previous year.

News.Title: Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds Reports 15% Rise in Q1 Net Profit to 128 Million Rupees
News.Summary: Bombay Super Hybrid Seeds reported a net profit of 128 million rupees in Q1, representing a 15% increase from 111 million rupees in the same quarter last year. However, the company's revenue declined to 1.53 billion rupees compared to 1.57 billion rupees in the previous year's corresponding quarter, marking a decrease of approximately 2.5%.
